short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and Share with the GroupUp Browser Extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The GroupUp Browser Extension adds in the advanced saving and sharing features of GroupUp to all pages on the internet.  Whether you want to save a (link, quote, image, video) for later or just share it with friends, this is the ideal way to do it.
